rooms.name: Salty Springs
rooms.description: You now enter Salty Springs, a small, desolate town with overgrown vegetation and abandoned buildings. The air is thick with the scent of salt and decay.

rooms.name: Retail Row
rooms.description: You enter Retail Row, a once-bustling shopping district now in ruins. Shattered glass litters the ground, and the remnants of storefronts line the street.

rooms.name: Dusty Divot
rooms.description: Dusty Divot, a large crater in the ground filled with strange, glowing rocks and remnants of an alien spacecraft. The air hums with an otherworldly energy.

rooms.name: Lonely Lodge
rooms.description: Lonely Lodge, a secluded area surrounded by dense forest. The sound of wildlife is all around, but there is an eerie feeling of being watched.

rooms.name: Haunted Hills
rooms.description: Haunted Hills, a graveyard shrouded in mist and filled with ancient tombstones. Whispers of the past seem to float through the air, sending chills down your spine.
